name: Release the Midi-Chlorians
description:
A game inspired by a scene from the Star Wars movie "The Last Jedi"

** CONTAINS MAJOR SPOILERS **

Rey meets with Kylo, and she is about to face Snoke. Kylo must make an important decision, and "release his midi-chlorians".

Note: You can skip the intro in the beginning. There's a hidden 3rd option in the main menu.
